author: kpedro88
body: @hatakeyamak noticed an occasional crash in `RecoEcal/EgammaCoreTools/plugins/EcalClusterCrackCorrection.cc`. I found that it ultimately occurred because the exclusion of HGCal cells from some parts of the egamma algorithms had not been updated for the new geometry and DetIds. I had previously made a simple function to do this for `GEDPhotonProducer`. I have now moved that function into `EcalTools` and propagated it to every instance I could find.
title: HGCal v9 fixes for egamma
